feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Periods of snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
